Direct Known Subclasses:
TouchPadCursorWidget, TouchPadMobileWidget, TouchPadNintendoDS, TouchPadScrollWidget
public abstract class TouchPadWidget
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.LayoutPanel

A generic implementation of a remote mouse control component

Author:
Oliver Schmid
